title: NoFap Panic Button
name: panicbutton
description: This extension provides an in browser version of the NoFap Emergency Relapse Prevention Tool.
author: Mark A. Ropper

preferences.name: extensions.panicbutton.nsfwGuardEnabled
preferences.title: NSFWGuard
preferences.description: Enabling NSFWGuard will allow the extension to detect whether a subreddit is flagged as NSFW (for over 18s only) and will redirect you to a page of your choice if it is.

preferences.name: extensions.panicbutton.safehavenUrl
preferences.title: NSFWGuard Redirect
preferences.description: The URL you want NSFWGuard to redirect you to.
